attributes.action: explain why more and more respected analysts and trusted commentators are saying that he really is nuts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today (19 June 2009) the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Republic of Iran said that he considered the british government to be the most evil of all governments.  Could that also be a comment on the mental state of our fraudulent leader?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
